Name: Giant Four-Armed Gargoyle
Damage Resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons
Traits: False Appearance. While the gargoyle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.
Actions: Multiattack. The gargoyle makes five attacks: one with its bite and four with its claws. Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage. Claw. Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.
